means: 达卡（孟加拉共和国首都）

sentence.Network_en: The Indian troops seized Dacca and Paskistan troops in East Pakistan surrendered.
sentence.Network_cn: 印度军队占领达卡,在东巴的巴基斯坦军队投降.

sentence.Network_en: Hydraulic system still leak , we'll be able to manage ( steer ) it to DACCA.

sentence.Network_en: Graceful as butterflies, boats glide past rice fields on the meandering Turag River near Dacca, Bangladesh.
sentence.Network_cn: 在孟加拉国的达卡周边,蝴蝶般美丽的帆船从蜿蜒的Turag河河边的稻田旁经过.
